snippet: Utilities led declines for stocks as bond yields continued to climb. Energy shares rose with the price of oil.
abstract: Stocks continue in rut, marking slight losses as energy sector gains are offset by slump in utilities.
lead_paragraph: Utilities led declines for stocks as bond yields continued to climb. Energy shares rose with the price of oil.

headline.main: Market Ticks Lower as Utility Shares Slump
headline.print_headline: Shares Slip a Bit as Utilities Slump
